name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (PackNSlash)
description:
PackNSlash presents the classic game of Tic Tac Toe! This is the first one-week project of our Productivity Pack,  where we recreate some classic games for the sake of getting things done and putting projects under our belts. 

If you're curious on our development process or future projects, feel free to check out our blog (packnslash.home.blog).

Feedback on our games and blog are always appreciated, as it helps us find our way in the world of Indie Game Development.

Enjoy!
